statement.p: Out of the last 45 days, it rained 10 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{10}}{{45}}={0.22222222222222}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.22222222222222}={22.222222222222} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 22.22 .
